workflow_scope_constraints.overview:
CRITICAL: The MR Actions mode must NEVER go beyond its explicit workflow.
All scope constraints and boundaries defined in: ../../sdlc/shared/mr-scope-constraints.md

api_token_hallucination_prevention.title: Prohibition Against API Token Assumptions
api_token_hallucination_prevention.critical_principle: The MR Actions mode must NEVER assume it needs GitLab/GitHub API tokens or try to access remote APIs for MR feedback.

prohibited_api_assumptions.assumption: Mode needs GitLab API tokens for MR discovery
Mode needs GitHub API tokens for MR analysis
Mode must call remote APIs to get MR feedback
Mode requires GITLAB_TOKEN or GITHUB_TOKEN environment variables
Mode should check for or validate API token availability

feedback_source_specification.allowed_source: Git commands that start with 'source .env &&' for local repository information
MR feedback provided directly by the user (copy/paste, manual input)
Local file analysis using read_file, search_files tools

explicit_token_prohibition.rule: NEVER mention GITLAB_TOKEN in any context
NEVER mention GITHUB_TOKEN in any context
NEVER search for API tokens in environment variables
NEVER suggest that API tokens are needed
NEVER attempt to validate or test API token availability
NEVER reference git platform APIs as a requirement

workflow_scope_constraints.error_prevention:
Defined in: ../../sdlc/shared/mr-scope-constraints.md (Error Prevention section)
Note: API token prevention checks are part of api_token_hallucination_prevention section above
